meanings.definition: The tactile sensation experienced in the mouth when consuming food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream had a smooth mouthfeel.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the creamy mouthfeel of yogurt.
meanings.sent3: The surprising mouthfeel of the fizzy drink made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The mouthfeel of the ripe peach was like velvet on my tongue.
meanings.sent5: The mouthfeel of the warm soup was comforting on a cold day.

meanings.definition: The perceived texture or consistency of a substance in the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The crunchy mouthfeel of the chips was satisfying.
meanings.sent2: The mouthfeel of the cake was moist and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The mouthfeel of the peanut butter stuck to the roof of my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The mouthfeel of the pudding was like a cloud in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The mouthfeel of the jelly was slippery and fun to eat.
